017package org.apache.juneau.rest.stats;
018
019import java.lang.reflect.*;
020import java.util.*;
021import java.util.concurrent.atomic.*;
022
023import org.apache.juneau.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.marshaller.*;
027
028/**
029 * Method execution statistics.
030 *
031 * Keeps track of number of starts/finishes on tasks and keeps an average run time.
032 *
033 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
034 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/ExecutionStatistics">REST method execution statistics</a>
035 * </ul>
036 */
037public class MethodExecStats {
038
039   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
040   // Static
041   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
042
043   /**
044    * Static creator.
045    *
046    * @param beanStore The bean store to use for creating beans.
047    * @return A new builder for this object.
048    */
049   public static Builder create(BeanStore beanStore) {
050      return new Builder(beanStore);
051   }
052
053   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
054   // Builder
055   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
056
057   /**
058    * Builder class.
059    */
060   public static class Builder extends BeanBuilder<MethodExecStats> {
061
062      Method method;
063      ThrownStore thrownStore;
064
065      /**
066       * Constructor.
067       *
068       * @param beanStore The bean store to use for creating beans.
069       */
070      protected Builder(BeanStore beanStore) {
071         super(MethodExecStats.class, beanStore);
072      }
073
074      @Override /* BeanBuilder */
075      protected MethodExecStats buildDefault() {
076         return new MethodExecStats(this);
077      }
078
079      //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
080      // Properties
081      //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
082
083      /**
084       * Specifies the Java method.
085       *
086       * @param value The new value for this setting.
087       * @return This object.
088       */
089      public Builder method(Method value) {
090         method = value;
091         return this;
092      }
093
094      /**
095       * Specifies the thrown store for tracking exceptions.
096       *
097       * @param value The new value for this setting.
098       * @return This object.
099       */
100      public Builder thrownStore(ThrownStore value) {
101         thrownStore = value;
102         return this;
103      }
104      @Override /* Overridden from BeanBuilder */
105      public Builder impl(Object value) {
106         super.impl(value);
107         return this;
108      }
109
110      @Override /* Overridden from BeanBuilder */
111      public Builder type(Class<?> value) {
112         super.type(value);
113         return this;
114      }
115   }
116
117   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
118   // Instance
119   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
120
121   private final long guid;
122   private final Method method;
123   private final ThrownStore thrownStore;
124
125   private volatile int minTime = -1, maxTime;
126
127   private AtomicInteger
128      starts = new AtomicInteger(),
129      finishes = new AtomicInteger(),
130      errors = new AtomicInteger();
131
132   private AtomicLong
133      totalTime = new AtomicLong();
134
135   /**
136    * Constructor.
137    *
138    * @param builder The builder for this object.
139    */
140   protected MethodExecStats(Builder builder) {
141      this.guid = new Random().nextLong();
142      this.method = builder.method;
143      this.thrownStore = builder.thrownStore != null ? builder.thrownStore : new ThrownStore();
144   }
145
146   /**
147    * Call when task is started.
148    *
149    * @return This object.
150    */
151   public MethodExecStats started() {
152      starts.incrementAndGet();
153      return this;
154   }
155
156   /**
157    * Call when task is finished.
158    *
159    * @param nanoTime The execution time of the task in nanoseconds.
160    * @return This object.
161    */
162   public MethodExecStats finished(long nanoTime) {
163      finishes.incrementAndGet();
164      int milliTime = (int)(nanoTime/1_000_000);
165      totalTime.addAndGet(nanoTime);
166      minTime = minTime == -1 ? milliTime : Math.min(minTime, milliTime);
167      maxTime = Math.max(maxTime, milliTime);
168      return this;
169   }
170
171   /**
172    * Call when an error occurs.
173    *
174    * @param e The exception thrown.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
175    * @return This object.
176    */
177   public MethodExecStats error(Throwable e) {
178      errors.incrementAndGet();
179      thrownStore.add(e);
180      return this;
181   }
182
183   /**
184    * Returns a globally unique ID for this object.
185    *
186    * <p>
187    * A random long generated during the creation of this object.
188    * Allows this object to be differentiated from other similar objects in multi-node environments so that
189    * statistics can be reliably stored in a centralized location.
190    *
191    * @return The globally unique ID for this object.
192    */
193   public long getGuid() {
194      return guid;
195   }
196
197   /**
198    * Returns the method name of these stats.
199    *
200    * @return The method name of these stats.
201    */
202   public Method getMethod() {
203      return method;
204   }
205
206   /**
207    * Returns the number of times the {@link #started()} method was called.
208    *
209    * @return The number of times the {@link #started()} method was called.
210    */
211   public int getRuns() {
212      return starts.get();
213   }
214
215   /**
216    * Returns the number currently running method invocations.
217    *
218    * @return The number of currently running method invocations.
219    */
220   public int getRunning() {
221      return starts.get() - finishes.get();
222   }
223
224   /**
225    * Returns the number of times the {@link #error(Throwable)} method was called.
226    *
227    * @return The number of times the {@link #error(Throwable)} method was called.
228    */
229   public int getErrors() {
230      return errors.get();
231   }
232
233   /**
234    * Returns the max execution time.
235    *
236    * @return The average execution time in milliseconds.
237    */
238   public int getMinTime() {
239      return minTime == -1 ? 0 : minTime;
240   }
241
242   /**
243    * Returns the max execution time.
244    *
245    * @return The average execution time in milliseconds.
246    */
247   public int getMaxTime() {
248      return maxTime;
249   }
250
251   /**
252    * Returns the average execution time.
253    *
254    * @return The average execution time in milliseconds.
255    */
256   public int getAvgTime() {
257      int runs = finishes.get();
258      return runs == 0 ? 0 : (int)(getTotalTime() / runs);
259   }
260
261   /**
262    * Returns the total execution time.
263    *
264    * @return The total execution time in milliseconds.
265    */
266   public long getTotalTime() {
267      return totalTime.get() / 1_000_000;
268   }
269
270   /**
271    * Returns information on all stack traces of all exceptions encountered.
272    *
273    * @return Information on all stack traces of all exceptions encountered.
274    */
275   public ThrownStore getThrownStore() {
276      return thrownStore;
277   }
278
279   @Override /* Object */
280   public String toString() {
281      return Json5.of(this);
282   }
283}
